alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Norfolk; Suffolk; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:27PM EDT until July 27 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Worcester County in central Massachusetts... Western Norfolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Western Suffolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Southeastern Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 527 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Northbridge, or near Milford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Boston, Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Natick, Watertown, Franklin, Lexington, Needham, Norwood, Milford, Wellesley, Stoughton, Dedham, Belmont, Walpole, Canton and Westborough. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
